short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play The Keyboard smash game for Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever just want to smash your keyboard?
This is the perfect game for you!
The keyboard smash game is exactly what it sounds like. Every time you press a key (including shift, ctrl, and other keys) you get a point! There are also levels to keep you motivated!

I hope you enjoy the keyboard smash game!
